SEARCH
Module org.example.cybooks
Package org.cybooks

Class LoanDAO

java.lang.Object
org.cybooks.LoanDAO
public class LoanDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for Loan entities. Handles database operations related to Loan entities.

  • Method Details

    • addNewLoan

      public static Result addNewLoan(String isbnBook, int idMember)
      Adds a new loan record to the database.
      Parameters:
      isbnBook - the ISBN of the book to be borrowed
      idMember - the ID of the member borrowing the book
      Returns:
      a Result object containing the success status and a message

    • verifyIfUserHaveBorrowedBook

      public static boolean verifyIfUserHaveBorrowedBook(String isbnBook, int idMember)
      Checks if a user has already borrowed a specific book.
      Parameters:
      isbnBook - the ISBN of the book
      idMember - the ID of the member
      Returns:
      true if the user has borrowed the book, false otherwise

    • verifyMaximumBookExamples

      public static boolean verifyMaximumBookExamples(String isbnBook)
      Checks if the maximum number of book examples has already been borrowed.
      Parameters:
      isbnBook - the ISBN of the book
      Returns:
      true if the maximum number has been borrowed, false otherwise

    • getAllLoans

      public static List<Loan> getAllLoans()
      Retrieves the list of all loans.
      Returns:
      the list of all loans

    • getLoans

      public static List<Loan> getLoans(int idUser)
      Retrieves a list of loans for a given user.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of loans associated with the user

    • updateUsersState

      public static void updateUsersState()
      Updates the state of users based on their loan status.

    • getTopFourBooks

      public static List<String[]> getTopFourBooks()
      Retrieves information about the top four most borrowed books.
      Returns:
      a list of string arrays containing ISBN and loan count of the top four books

    • getLoanExpiredCount

      public static int getLoanExpiredCount()
      Retrieves the count of loans that have expired.
      Returns:
      the count of expired loans

    • getTotalLoans

      public static int getTotalLoans()
      Retrieves the total count of loans in the database.
      Returns:
      the total count of loans

    • deleteLoan

      public static void deleteLoan(int loanId)
      Deletes a loan record from the database.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the ID of the loan to be deleted

    • renewLoan

      public static void renewLoan(int loanId)
      Renews the loan by extending its duration.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the ID of the loan to be renewed
